useCase.name: Manage Book Information
useCase.description: Librarian accesses book editing section, requests and updates book details.

mainSequence.step: Request book details from Library Management Interface (LMI).
Query book details from Book Management System (BMS) via Database.
Show book details to Librarian through LMI.
Edit book and location information via LMI.
Update book details and location in Database via BMS, confirm success.
Confirm successful update to Librarian from BMS.
Display update confirmation to Librarian via LMI.
